portfolioText: Welcome to my portfolio. Here you’ll find a selection of my work. Explore my projects to learn more about what I do.
introThirdLine: "The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step."
longText: As a motivated Computer Science and Technology student at Champlain, I’m passionate about software development and problem-solving. I've gained extensive knowledge in backend and frontend development through collaborative projects, enhancing both my technical skills and ability to work in teams. Always eager to learn, I’m ready to take on new challenges and contribute meaningfully to any project.
